question: Which video game project did Gary Jamroz-Palma work on as a Senior Concept Artist?
Which location from Life is Strange did Gary Jamroz-Palma create concept art for?
What is the name of the photo contest that Daniel DaCosta enters in Life is Strange?
What did Michel Koch confirm on Twitter about Gary Jamroz-Palma's appearance in Life is Strange?

choices.A: He was a hidden character in the game.
choices.B: He was the voice actor for a minor character.
choices.C: He was a model for a photo contest entry.
choices.D: He was a concept artist working at DONTNOD's studio.
